name: Customer Attachments Report
query:
SELECT
    c.name AS "Customer ID",  -- Include the ID for linking
    c.customer_name AS "Customer Name:Link/Customer",
    ca.attach_name AS "Attachment Names",
    ca.doc_start AS "Attachment Start Dates",
    ca.doc_end AS "Attachment End Dates",
    ca.attach_file AS "Attachment Files"
FROM
    `tabCustomer` c
LEFT JOIN
    `tabCustomer Attachment` ca ON c.name = ca.parent;
